references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, which is the core foundation of the proposed 3DET-Mamba model in this paper.

references.paper_title: An End-to-End Transformer Model for 3D Object Detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3DETR model, which serves as the baseline model for comparison against the proposed 3DET-Mamba model.

references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces PointNet, a foundational deep learning architecture for processing point cloud data, which is relevant to the proposed method's approach.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This paper introduces PointNet++, an improvement upon PointNet, which provides a more sophisticated deep learning architecture for point cloud data processing.

references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces the ScanNet dataset, which is one of the primary datasets used for evaluating the performance of the proposed 3DET-Mamba model.
